content.description:
The coral species Acropora millepora is a marine animal that has a symbiotic relationship with algae species in the genus Symbiodinium. An increase in the concentration of dissolved <math alttext="C O 2" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in oceans has a negative impact on this relationship and the health of the coral species. Scientists investigated the effect of <math alttext="C O 2" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> concentrations on the number of algae cells found in the coral (Figure 1) and on both the gross (total) and net rates of photosynthesis of those algae (Figure 2). The net rate of photosynthesis is equal to the gross rate of photosynthesis minus the rate of respiration by the algae.

Figure 1. Effect of <math alttext="C O 2" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration on the number of algae per <math alttext="square centimeters" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> of coral. Error bars represent <math alttext="plus or minus 2 S E sub x bar" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>±</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mtext>SE</mtext><mover accent="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>¯</mo></mover></msub></math>.

Figure 2. Average gross and net rates of photosynthesis in algae under various concentrations of <math alttext="C O 2" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. Error bars represent <math alttext="plus or minus 2 S E sub x bar" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mo>±</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mtext>SE</mtext><mover accent="true"><mi>x</mi><mo>¯</mo></mover></msub></math>.
content.question: Based on Figure 1, which of the following values best represents the change in the number of algal cells at the high concentration of <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> as compared with the number at the low concentration of <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: 5.A: Perform mathematical calculations, including: i. mathematical equations in the curriculum ii. means iii. rates iv. ratios v. percentages and percent changes
